comments.body:
Please put all equations in backticks to make them render as code. This is very hard to read without that sort of font-based highlighting.

The math in this example is wrong. The example text is confusing and misleading, it needs to be rewritten.

This is the correct trigonometric replacement:  e^(x+iy) = e^x * e^iy = e^x * (cos y + i sin y).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@
  For complex numbers, the exponential value is calculated as follows:

  ```
  e^(x+iy) = e^x * e^iy = e^x * (cos y + i sin y)
